title: Who is in the band 'Metallica'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Metallica's as a whole is always 4 members but it's changed twice. James Hetfield us Vocalist and Rhythm Guitarist Kirk Hammett is the Lead Guitarist Lars Ulrich plays the drums Cliff Burton was the ORIGINAL Bass guitarist who died in 1986 Jason Newsted replaced Cliff Burton later (don't know the dates) Jason Newsted left and Robert Trujillo was hired as the next bass guitarist, which he still is today You could perhaps count Megadeth front man Dave Mustaine, as before Kirk joined Dave was the lead guitarist in Metallica. This was however before any recording on the debut Kill Em All
Metallica has 4 band members. James Hetfield is the lead vocalist and rhythm guitarist. Lars Ulrich is the drummer. Kirk Hammett is the lead guitarist. Robert Trujillo is the bass player.
